title: Robber brandished a stick in Dalhousie Street incident: Police
description: The city police robbery unit is asking the public to help them identify a suspect in a March 9 robbery on Dalhousie Street. Police say that a man was brandishing a long stick when he walked into the store near the Clarence Street intersection at 9:23 a.m. He …
